case_barcode.column_description: Original TCGA case barcode, eg TCGA-12-1089  --  note that each case typically has a primary-tumor sample and a matched-normal (blood or adjacent tissue) sample; please refer to the TCGA Biospecimen table for more details

normalized_count.column_description: Normalized gene expression from original rsem.genes.normalized_results file

platform.column_description: Platform used to generate data; either IlluminaHiSeq (for close to 93% of samples) or IlluminaGA

gene_id.column_description: The gene symbol. In this table, gene symbol is gene namee.g. ENSG00000251562

project_short_name.column_description: Project name abbreviation; the program name appended with a project name abbreviation; eg. TCGA-OV, etc.

aliquot_barcode.column_description: Original TCGA aliquot barcode, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A-01D-0517-01

sample_barcode.column_description: Original TCGA sample barcode, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A

HGNC_gene_symbol.column_description: HUGO Gene Nomenclature Committee gene symbol, based on gene_id in original data file, eg AMY1A. Null if no gene symbol could be found (see documentation for additional details regarding ETL) http://isb-cancer-genomics-cloud.readthedocs.io/en/latest/sections/data/data2/ETL_mRNAexpression.html

original_gene_symbol.column_description: Gene symbol from the original data file, differs if the approved gene symbol has since changed, eg C11orf17 became AKIP1

project_short_name.column_description: Project name abbreviation; the program name appended with a project name abbreviation; eg. TCGA-OV, etc.

n_alt_count.column_description: Read depth supporting the variant allele in normal BAM (cleared in somatic MAF)

Hugo_Symbol.column_description: HUGO symbol for the gene (HUGO symbols are always in all caps). Unknown is used for regions that do not correspond to a gene

case_barcode.column_description: Original TCGA case barcode, eg TCGA-12-1089  --  note that each case typically has a primary-tumor sample and a matched-normal (blood or adjacent tissue) sample; please refer to the TCGA Biospecimen table for more details

STRAND.column_description: DNA strand (1 or -1) on which the transcript/feature lies

sample_barcode_normal.column_description: TCGA sample barcode for the normal control, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A. One sample may have multiple sets of CN segmentations corresponding to multiple aliquots; use GROUP BY appropriately in queries

Tumor_Seq_Allele1.column_description: Primary data genotype for tumor sequencing (discovery) allele 1. A - symbol for a deletion represents a variant. A - symbol for an insertion represents wild-type allele. Novel inserted sequence for insertion does not include flanking reference bases

NCBI_Build.column_description: The reference genome used for the alignment (GRCh37)

Consequence.column_description: Consequence type of this variant; sequence ontology terms

HGNC_ID.column_description: Gene identifier from the HUGO Gene Nomenclature Committee if applicable

SYMBOL.column_description: Eg TP53, LRP1B, etc (same as Hugo_Symbol field except blank instead of Unknown

IMPACT.column_description: Impact modifier for the consequence type

dbSNP_RS.column_description: Rs-IDs from the dbSNP database, novel if not found in any database used, or null if there is no dbSNP record, but it is found in other databases

EAS_MAF.column_description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes combined East Asian population

HGVSp.column_description: Protein sequence of the variant in HGVS recommended format. p.= signifies no change in the protein

AFR_MAF.column_description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes combined African population

n_ref_count.column_description: Read depth supporting the reference allele in normal BAM (cleared in somatic MAF)

FILTER.column_description: Copied from input VCF. This includes filters implemented directly by the variant caller and other external software used in the DNA-Seq pipeline

HGVSc.column_description: Coding sequence of the variant in HGVS recommended format

CLIN_SIG.column_description: Clinical significance of variant from dbSNP

CDS_position.column_description: Relative position of base pair in coding sequence. A - symbol is displayed as the numerator if the variant does not appear in coding sequence

Amino_acids.column_description: Amino acid substitution caused by the mutation, only given if the variation affects the protein-coding sequence

Codons.column_description: Alternative codons with the variant base in upper case

HGVS_OFFSET.column_description: Indicates by how many bases the HGVS notations for this variant have been shifted

EA_MAF.column_description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in NHLBI-ESP European American population

ENSP.column_description: Ensembl protein identifier of the affected transcript

t_ref_count.column_description: Read depth supporting the reference allele in tumor BAM

CONTEXT.column_description: Reference allele per VCF specs, and its five flanking base pairs

GMAF.column_description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes

t_depth.column_description: Read depth across this locus in tumor BAM

PUBMED.column_description: Pubmed ID(s) of publications that cite existing variant

n_depth.column_description: Read depth across this locus in normal BAM

AA_MAF.column_description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in NHLBI-ESP African American population

Feature_type.column_description: Type of feature. Currently one of Transcript, RegulatoryFeature, MotifFeature (or blank)

Transcript_ID.column_description: Ensembl ID of the transcript affected by the variant

NCALLERS.column_description: Number of callers: a value between 2 and 8 (most common is 5)

Chromosome.column_description: Chromosome, possible values: 1, X, etc (ie does not include chr prefix)

aliquot_barcode_normal.column_description: TCGA aliquot barcode for the normal control, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A-01D-0517-01

AMR_MAF.column_description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes combined American population

DISTANCE.column_description: Shortest distance from the variant to transcript

Feature.column_description: Stable Ensembl ID of feature (transcript, regulatory, motif)

cDNA_position.column_description: Relative position of base pair in the cDNA sequence as a fraction. A - symbol is displayed as the numerator if the variant does not appear in cDNA

SAS_MAF.column_description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes combined South Asian population

t_alt_count.column_description: Read depth supporting the variant allele in tumor BAM

CCDS.column_description: CCDS identifier for this transcript, where applicable

PHENO.column_description: Indicates if existing variant is associated with a phenotype, disease or trait (0, 1, or null)

SYMBOL_SOURCE.column_description: The source of the gene symbol, usually HGNC, rarely blank, other sources include Uniprot_gn, EntrezGene, etc

Start_Position.column_description: Lowest numeric position of the reported variant on the genomic reference sequence. Mutation start coordinate

CALLERS.column_description: |-delimited list of mutation caller(s) that agreed on this particular call, always in alphabetical order: muse, mutect, somaticsniper, varscan

DOMAINS.column_description: Source and identifier of any overlapping protein domains

Tumor_Seq_Allele2.column_description: Primary data genotype for tumor sequencing (discovery) allele 2. A - symbol for a deletion represents a variant. A - symbol for an insertion represents wild-type allele. Novel inserted sequence for insertion does not include flanking reference bases

aliquot_barcode_tumor.column_description: TCGA aliquot barcode for the tumor, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A-01D-0517-01

HGVSp_Short.column_description: Same as the HGVSp column, but using 1-letter amino-acid codes

Variant_Type.column_description: Type of mutation. TNP (tri-nucleotide polymorphism) is analogous to DNP (di-nucleotide polymorphism) but for three consecutive nucleotides. ONP (oligo-nucleotide polymorphism) is analogous to TNP but for consecutive runs of four or more (SNP, DNP, TNP, ONP, INS, DEL, or Consolidated)

CANONICAL.column_description: A flag (YES) indicating that the VEP-based canonical transcript, the longest translation, was used for this gene, if not, the value is null

Reference_Allele.column_description: The plus strand reference allele at this position. Includes the deleted sequence for a deletion or - for an insertion

EUR_MAF.column_description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes combined European population

all_effects.column_description: A semicolon delimited list of all possible variant effects, sorted by priority ([Symbol,Consequence,HGVSp_Short,Transcript_ID,RefSeq,HGVSc,Impact,Canonical,Sift,PolyPhen,Strand])

Gene.column_description: The gene symbol. In this table, gene symbol is simulated data e.g. ENSG00000251562

ASN_MAF.column_description: Non-reference allele and frequency of existing variant in 1000 Genomes combined Asian population

SIFT.column_description: SIFT prediction and/or score, with both given as prediction (score)

Protein_position.column_description: Relative position of affected amino acid in protein. A - symbol is displayed as the numerator if the variant does not appear in coding sequence

sample_barcode_tumor.column_description: TCGA sample barcode for the tumor, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A. One sample may have multiple sets of CN segmentations corresponding to multiple aliquots; use GROUP BY appropriately in queries

SOMATIC.column_description: Somatic status of each ID reported under Existing_variation (0, 1, or null)
